## ClassDecoratorManager.isDecorated() method

Check if a class is already decorated

**Signature:**

```typescript
isDecorated(target: Function): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | Function | Class to check |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if decorated, false otherwise
